SEARCH
程序包 jack.ui

类 Ui

java.lang.Object
jack.ui.Ui
public class Ui extends Object
The user interface class for the Jack application. Responsible for displaying messages to the user and handling user interactions.

      public void todo(TaskList list, ToDo todo)
      Displays a message when a todo task is added successfully.
      参数:
      list - The current task list.
      todo - The todo task that was added.

      event - The event task that was added.

      Displays a goodbye message when the application exits.

      list - The task list to display.

      Displays a message when a task is marked as done.
